purpose: Facilitates the development and orchestration of multi-agent systems with support for advanced AI models
principle: Builds on the OpenAI Swarm framework, integrating Groq and Anthropic models for enhanced agent collaboration
reusability: Offers modular architecture for easy integration and extension, compatible with various AI models
limitations: In early development stages; may have limited documentation and support for certain use cases
name: microagent
description: A fork of OpenAI Swarm that supports Groq and Anthropic
highlight: Supports Groq and Anthropic, enhancing multi-agent orchestration capabilities
